import React ,{useEffect} from 'react' import Notification from './Notification' import useConnectionHook from '../Hooks/connectionHook' const {useSupplier} = require('../context/Refresh') const Connection = () => { const {triggerUpdate} = useSupplier() const{connections , getConnections} = useConnectionHook() useEffect(() => { getConnections() }, [triggerUpdate]) console.log(connections?.connections?.userId.name) return ( <>

Notification

All User

Bonnie Green
) } export default Connection
